title: Monster Hunter 2 Wiki | Quests
description: All known quests and in-depth data.
name: Here are all known quests in MH2, including as much data on rewards and monster health as I could find. Listed event quests are all known events released up to November 2006.
head: <link rel='stylesheet' href='../css/quests.css'/><link rel='stylesheet' href='../mh2/css/quests.css'/>
